hibernate-mapping.query: select new org.mifos.application.productdefinition.util.valueobjects.MasterObject(pam.prdApplicableMasterId,lookupvalue.lookUpValue) from org.mifos.application.master.util.valueobjects.PrdApplicableMaster pam,org.mifos.application.master.util.valueobjects.LookUpValueLocale lookupvalue where pam.lookUpId=lookupvalue.lookUpId and lookupvalue.localeId=:localeId

select new org.mifos.application.productdefinition.util.valueobjects.MasterObject(pam.prdApplicableMasterId,lookupvalue.lookUpValue) from org.mifos.application.master.util.valueobjects.PrdApplicableMaster pam,org.mifos.application.master.util.valueobjects.LookUpValueLocale lookupvalue where pam.lookUpId=lookupvalue.lookUpId and lookupvalue.localeId=:localeId and pam.prdApplicableMasterId != :offerinApplicableCentersId
